nodes.text: The Soft Landings Inn was located on Quarter Moon Street on Coruscant.

The inn was made entirely from salvaged materials. Durasteel sheets and conductor pipes wrapped around it, and the entire building, which had at least three levels, leaned to one side. It provided minimal comfort and was only really for travelers to get a few hours of sleep. Security was extremely lax at the inn, and anyone could book a room as long as they had the credits to pay for it.

In 43 BBY, Jedi Knight Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan, Obi-Wan Kenobi, came to the inn looking for the infamous bounty hunter Ona Nobis. After a brief battle, Nobis escaped using her natural Sorrusian abilities.
